comments.body: This comments are optional dependencies? Do you want to provide them or are you OK with this PR the way it is?

I'm ok with the way it is; this is a pretty diverse set of dependencies that fit a variety of use cases; there are plenty of folks who might want to use `Flask-Admin` without using Google AppEngine or MongoDB.

Maybe related to issue ( https://github.com/conda/conda/issues/3299 ). Though some people have already stated they think this case is out of scope. That being said, I don't think a final decision has occurred on that yet.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +41,45 @@    # - pymongo
    # Required for flask_admin.contrib.sqla and flask_admin.contrib.sqlamodel:
    # - sqlalchemy

test:
